item.description:
Marshfield, MA (KGHG).

We can fly into Marshfield and have dinner at
Fieldston Restaurant (www.thefieldston.com) located right on the ocean. We could take a shuttle or walk the short distance.
How about Wednesday, August 20th. The weather has been so bad I'm sure everyone is up for a nice beautiful scenic flight. We meet at Charley's hangar. Wheels up 5:30, eat and enjoy a sunset flight back.

http://www.airnav.com...
55.4 nautical miles

This is Gary Archer's great idea. Good going Gary! Thanks!

The restaurant is basically on the approach end of the runway we can take a shuttle or we could walk. (half the distance that BID and town walk is; one mile??)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Marshfield, MA (KGHG). Oceanfront dining
